Package pacmangameplay.charactercontrol

Class Summary
CharacterCollisionChecker Checks collision between characters.
Characters Object of all the characters of the Pacman game: Pacman and the Ghosts Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Clyde.
Ghost Character Ghost in the game.
GhostControl Controller for a Ghost's movement, mode and color.
Pacman Pacman character.
PacmanControl Controller for a Pacman's movement.
ShortestDistanceFinder This class is used by ghosts to determine which tile to move into next.
TargetTileFinder Finds the target coordinates of the Ghosts in all modes.
VelocityChecker This class determines whether the movement specified by a key press if valid.
WallCollisionChecker Prevents any character from going through walls.
 

Enum Summary
Ghost.Name  
ShortestDistanceFinder.directionCheck  
VelocityChecker.typeVel
